text: Daphnella ponteleviensis is an extinct species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Raphitomidae.MNHN, Paris: Daphnella ponteleviensis Cossmann, 1896 ==Distribution== Fossils of this marine species were found in Miocene strata of Loire-et-Cher, France. ==References== * Cossmann (M.), 1896 Essais de Paléoconchologie comparée (2ème livraison), p. 1-179 ponteleviensis Category:Gastropods described in 1896
title: Daphnella ponteleviensis
